name: THE LONE ISLAND SURVIVAL
description:
Take part of THE LONE ISLAND SURVIVAL game!
You are the only person living on an island, but not alone. Many beasts and zombies live with you there. You will never take rest, because some of them wants to attack you from the dark, but other time you don’t let yourself starve or thirst, and should live civilized. You can build your own home as you please. So you should hunt, craft, build and collect everything that can help you survive in the foreign wild nature.
Available on windows and mac

The current features include:

  • Beautiful visuals
  • Many Tools 
  • Many Guns 
  • Complex Crafting system
  • Large walkable area
  • Storage Boxes 
  • Mining 
  • Animals
  • Enemies
  • Day & Night Cycle
